        Throws:

      • insertNewReferral

        public static void insertNewReferral​(int patientID,
                                     int employeeID,
                                     int procedureID,
                                     java.lang.String urgency,
                                     java.lang.String referralReason,
                                     java.lang.String specialComments,
                                     int height,
                                     int weight,
                                     int heartRate,
                                     int systolicPressure,
                                     int diastolicPressure)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Inserts referral with all info and patient vitals.
        Parameters:
        patientID - Franky Skullfracture, being referred
        employeeID - Dr. Skeleton, referring
        procedureID - Procedure being referred for
        urgency - How close is this person to dying?
        referralReason - Data entry field collected from physician. Most likely along the lines of "this guy has problem"
        specialComments - List of medications/weight conflicts/yadda yadda that could interfere with procedure
        height - vitals
        weight - vitals
        heartRate - vitals
        systolicPressure - vitals
        diastolicPressure - vitals
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
